description: "An early 19th century map, with the regions of Southeast Asia marked with coloured borders: Malaya is red, indicating it is part of the British Empire; the orange borders around Sumatra, Borneo and Celebes show they are part of the Dutch East Indies."
label: "Plan of the Island Cocos / surveyed and drawn by Capt. James Colnett, 1793 ; engraved by T. Foot."
